name: Star Wars: The Escape
description: The Resistance is counting on you! As a protagonist, you have been captured by The First Order and find yourself trapped inside one of their cells. While in the cell, First Order leader, Kylo Ren, is trying to obtain the location of your allies secret base from you. But you've been captured on purpose and the First Order doesn't know it. Your mission is to break out of the cell, steal five of the First Order Star Destroyer Plans, and get to the escape pods unharmed.
